io.atomix.copycat.server.storage

Class SegmentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.atomix.copycat.server.storage.SegmentManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class SegmentManager
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    Log segment manager.

    The segment manager keeps track of segments in a given Log and provides an interface to loading, retrieving, and compacting those segments.

    Author:
    Jordan Halterman
